item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 24 – Games
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: We’re joined this week by our favourite Canadian friend – Adonis. Not only that but we also have Joe, from the Eight7 Podcast. And as we’re all huge fans of gaming, we thought that we’d talk about one of our favourite things. So enjoy this nerd fest and get into games! @adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk This [...]
item.content:encoded:
We’re joined this week by our favourite Canadian friend – Adonis. Not only that but we also have Joe, from the Eight7 Podcast. And as we’re all huge fans of gaming, we thought that we’d talk about one of our favourite things.

So enjoy this nerd fest and get into games!

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Adonis and Joe.

If the file isn’t working below, follow this link: Episode 24 – Games

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 23 – Dreams
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: This week, to comply with BBC rules, we have two female guests on the podcast. So many other podcasts have featured men that we needed at least one where the men were outnumbered. We discuss dreams this week and talk about some of the crazy hallucinations that each of us has dealt with in the [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week, to comply with BBC rules, we have two female guests on the podcast. So many other podcasts have featured men that we needed at least one where the men were outnumbered.

We discuss dreams this week and talk about some of the crazy hallucinations that each of us has dealt with in the past. You may even find out a little something about what your own dreams mean.

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Helen and Chloe.

If the file below isn’t working, following this link: Episode 23 – Dreams

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 22 – Board Games
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: We mentioned it last week and no doubt you’ve been waiting in anticipation for our podcast on board games. Well, here it is. We can hear your exclamations of, finally! Join us as we play monopoly and talk about our favourite board games, as children and today. Spoiler note: There was about £200 (Monopoly money) [...]
item.content:encoded:
We mentioned it last week and no doubt you’ve been waiting in anticipation for our podcast on board games. Well, here it is. We can hear your exclamations of, finally!

Join us as we play monopoly and talk about our favourite board games, as children and today.

Spoiler note: There was about £200 (Monopoly money) in it but Frazer eventually won. There will be a rematch.

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Aiden and Frazer.

There will be a rematch. @adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk This episode includes: Stephen, Aiden and Frazer.

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 21 – Politics
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: We’re back for Series 2 and to start us off, we’ve chosen a tough subject – politics. Of course we had to have Matt available for this one and David there to keep us in check / tell us what politics actually is. So relax and listen to Matt’s plans for his own political party [...]
item.content:encoded:
We’re back for Series 2 and to start us off, we’ve chosen a tough subject – politics.

Of course we had to have Matt available for this one and David there to keep us in check / tell us what politics actually is.

So relax and listen to Matt’s plans for his own political party and our views on the current state of affairs in politics.

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, David and Matt.

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 20 – Best of Series 1
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: It’s the final episode of the series, so we’ve collected our favourite moments from Series 1 and put them all together for you. We hope you’ve enjoyed the first series and we can’t wait for you to join us again in the new year for Series 2. There are some great extras planned for you [...]
item.content:encoded:
It’s the final episode of the series, so we’ve collected our favourite moments from Series 1 and put them all together for you.

We hope you’ve enjoyed the first series and we can’t wait for you to join us again in the new year for Series 2. There are some great extras planned for you and we’re really looking forward to sharing them with you. Don’t forget to keep sending in your questions:

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, David, Rob, Aiden, Matt, Will, Adonis, Frazer, Emily, Andy, Steve, Marcus, Luke, Rachel and Ryan.
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s the final episode of the series, so we’ve collected our favourite moments from Series 1 and put them all together for you. We hope you’ve enjoyed the first series and we can’t wait for you to join us again in the new yea[...]

There are some great extras planned for you and we’re really looking forward to sharing them with you. Don’t forget to keep sending in your questions: @adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk This episode includes: Stephen, David, Rob, Aiden, Matt, Will, Adonis, Frazer, Emily, Andy, Steve, Marcus, Luke, Rachel and Ryan.

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 19 – Exercise
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: Episode 19 is here, which means we’re almost at the end of Series 1. But don’t worry as we still have one more great podcast for you next week, until we take a break and improve the show in the new year. This week is all mostly about exercise, with some horrible gym stories thrown in. [...]
item.content:encoded:
Episode 19 is here, which means we’re almost at the end of Series 1. But don’t worry as we still have one more great podcast for you next week, until we take a break and improve the show in the new year.

This week is all mostly about exercise, with some horrible gym stories thrown in. We’re also joined by Andy, one of our avid listeners.

We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t forget to keep sending in your questions:

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Matt, Rob and Andy.

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 18 – Millionaire
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: What would you do with £1 million? That’s the question we asked each other this week. The life of a millionaire. We’re back with the guys – and Rachel – in London, to discuss what having a dream amount of money would mean to us. Does it actually end up being too little? We’ll see. [...]
item.content:encoded:
What would you do with £1 million? That’s the question we asked each other this week. The life of a millionaire.

We’re back with the guys – and Rachel – in London, to discuss what having a dream amount of money would mean to us. Does it actually end up being too little? We’ll see.

We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t forget to keep sending in your questions and intro songs to:

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Marcus, Steve, Luke and Rachel.
item.itunes:subtitle: What would you do with £1 million? That’s the question we asked each other this week. The life of a millionaire. We’re back with the guys – and Rachel – in London, to discuss what having a dream amount of money would mean to us. Does it [...]

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 17 – Metal
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: This week Ad Hoc Talk has gone on tour to discuss all things metal – the genre, not the material. We’ve been joined by a group of individuals, based in London, who are obsessed with metal, from the music to the scene and everything in between. We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week Ad Hoc Talk has gone on tour to discuss all things metal – the genre, not the material.

We’ve been joined by a group of individuals, based in London, who are obsessed with metal, from the music to the scene and everything in between.

We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t forget to keep sending in your questions and intro songs to:

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Marcus, Steve, Luke and Rachel.

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 16 – Achievements and Speed Runs
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: We’re joined by the A Team this week, Adonis is back. It’s time to discuss Achievements and everything to do with speed runs. We’re still waiting to get Trevor involved. We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t forget to keep sending in your questions and intro songs to: @adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk This episode [...]

We’re joined by the A Team this week, Adonis is back. It’s time to discuss Achievements and everything to do with speed runs. We’re still waiting to get Trevor involved.

We hope you enjoy our latest episode and don’t forget to keep sending in your questions and intro songs to:

item.title: Ad Hoc Talk Podcast Episode 15 – GTA V and Fez
item.dc:creator: stephenrdbuss
item.description: We’d like to welcome Emily, our first female guest on Ad Hoc Talk and she joined us for just the right one, as all the guys are ready to talk about GTA V. We’ll say that there could be some spoilers – there really aren’t – but we just want to warn you, incase you [...]
item.content:encoded:
We’d like to welcome Emily, our first female guest on Ad Hoc Talk and she joined us for just the right one, as all the guys are ready to talk about GTA V.

We’ll say that there could be some spoilers – there really aren’t – but we just want to warn you, incase you feel that we’ve ruined GTA V for you. We also discuss other games including Fez and a host of other Arcade games.

We hope you enjoy this week’s podcast and as ever, keep sending in your questions and intro songs to:

@adhoctalk | Facebook | hello@adhoctalk.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/adhoctalk

This episode includes:

Stephen, Dave, Aiden, Frazer and Emily.

Link dump:

  • GTA V
  • GTA III
  • GTA 1996
  • Saints Row IV
  • GTA V Online
  • Banter Brigade
  • Dragon
  • iFruit
  • Total War: Rome II

  • Skyrim

  • Super Meat Boy
  • Limbo
